text: Arau raja'i ka’le, ‘tomaloke i'uchuphaka mora ocaralai lai aha’. Tara pichata yetiya (rajara) duta te'omra ocarata upasthita ha’la tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘tumi tomara manibara ocarata ubhati yoraa arau te'omka sodhagai, yi naraisakale nijarae hata kati pela'ichila sihamtara arastha ki! Niscaya mora raba sihamtara chalana samparke samyaka aragata’
